summary: Two groups of people discover evidence that suggests spirits may be trying to invade the human world through the Internet.
cast: Haruhiko Katô|Kumiko Asô|Koyuki|Kurume Arisaka|Masatoshi Matsuo|Shinji Takeda|Jun Fubuki|Shun Sugata|Show Aikawa|Kôji Yakusho|Kenji Mizuhashi|Takumi Tanji|Hassei Takano|Atsushi Yuki|Go Takashima|Kaori Ichijô|Teruo Ono|Ken Furusawa|Akiko Kitamura|Zengoro Mamiana|Rie Yasuda|Masayuki Shionoya
title: Pulse (Kairo)
